name: Ultrex Quadro Maze
overview: The game has four mazes on the screen (in quadrants) and you run through the maze picking up dots (Collect-em-up, PacMan type) while being chased by a single ghost, at least at early levels. When finished with one maze, you move on to the next maze. The maze randomly changes until you press the fire button to start. The game requires you to maneuver Clyde through four onscreen mazes to earn the honor of doing battle with two deadly squids
